name: 黃麗珠
objective:
創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程為非商學系學生特別規劃,以深入淺出生活化的方式介紹以下內容：
(1)　　辨別創業與就業的概念
(2)　　一般財務報表概念與應用 
(3)  創業財務理論與實務
(4)  模擬創業財務專案規劃

The goal of the Introduction to Entrepreneurship and Finance course is to enable students to understand how to evaluate the business performance and value of enterprises through financial technology when the company is founded.
This course is specially designed for non-commercial students, and introduces the following in a life-like manner: 
(1) Identify the concepts of entrepreneurship and employment
(2) General financial statement concepts and applications
(3) Theory and Practice of Venture Finance
(4) Simulated venture finance project planning
